name: places/ChIJJQsNQvbzwokReGKswt5d7w8
formattedAddress: 232 Sherman Ave, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 232 Sherman Ave, New York, NY 10034-2501, USA

originalText.text:
Scheduled an appointment last week. Today I attempted to follow up over the phone and was hung up on due to a language barrier (guy on the phone didn't speak English.)

Ok. Quite unprofessional right off the bat.
I can forgive a language barrier but getting hung up on so abruptly really made me raise my eyebrows. I called back an hour later and spoke with an English speaker, but was told my name wasn't in their system.

So I missed my appointment. Or rather my appointment was never scheduled in the first place. Very concerning given that this is an institution that deals with peoples health. Rarely do I take time out of my day to write negative reviews but for this establishment I make an exception. I've visited taco stands more professional than this medical practice. If you're having health problems, take em to a better clinic. This place does not deserve to be in business.

originalText.text: This office is beyond ghetto, unprofessional, and commit INSURANCE FRAUD! I came to this office because I used to go to the one in dyckman. Big mistake the staff is ghetto ignorant and unprofessional. Barely speak English, don't do there job in checking your insurance, don't submit pre-authorizations, and billed my insurance for services they never did. I've been waiting on a pre-aithorization for 2 months from my insurance and they never even sent it. STAY AWAY FROM THIS OFFICE THE STAFF IS DEPLORABLE AND THEY SHOUPD BE INVESTIAGTED FOR FRAUD

originalText.text: This was the absolute worst doctors office I've ever been too.I called to pay for my consultation and to receive my prescription and they kept putting me on hold and hanging up. I blew up there're phone about 50 times no exaggeration. Most of them all speaks Spanish and even the ones who speaks English were doing the same thing to me.I literally hear them pick up the phone and hang it up. One guy answered and started speaking Spanish so I asked if he speak English and he said yes so I proceeded to tell him what I'm calling for and this man gonna ask if I speak Spanish cuz he doesn't speak English then put me on hold and hung up. I got a hold of one lady and she pretended to take my number down and told me someone will call me back so I can stop blowing up there're phone.then nobody gave me a call back. It's been four days of constant calling. And the doctor did my consult was so rude. Very disappointing. DO NOT COME HERE! I don't even write reviews... like I'm not even that kinda person so the fact that I just wrote this for this place should tell u how frustrated and unhappy Iam!!

originalText.text: The doctors are very good but unfortunately the staff front desk ... have not manners to the patient.. always with bad attitude.. boring and acting like they making us a favor when we ask for get any questions or try to talk with doctors... we paying our appointments always I don't know why is the reason to be mean with patients acting annoying.

originalText.text: If I could rate this office a zero, I would. All due to Dr. Barrett. He is the worst doctor. I’ve been trying to speak to Dr. Barrett for a month about my mother’s health and he refuses to speak to me. I’m also her proxy. As per a staff member, he doesn’t want to speak to me and she recommended a different doctor because this is a recurring issue with him. Extremely unprofessional. I’m looking for a different practice for might mother. As well as legal advice.
